hours.description: Number of hours submitted for this entry.

volunteerDate.description: The date and time the volunteer began.

hourType.description: Type of hour entry. Either need or individual.

miles.description: Number of miles submitted for this entry.

location.description: Location information added by the user.

description.description: Description information added by the user for this entry.

agencyId.description: Id of the agency that created the need.

agencyName.description: Name of the agency that created the need.

aemId.description: Unique ID of the Advanced Event attached to this item.

aemTitle.description: Title of the Advanced Event attached to this item.

needId.description: ID of the need to which the user responded.

needTitle.description: Name of the need to which the user responded.

needDate.description: Date of the need to which the user responded.

userId.description: ID of the user who responded.

firstName.description: First name of the user who responded.

lastName.description: Last name of the user who responded.

email.description: Email name of the user who responded.

dateAdded.description: The date, in ISO 8601 format, that hour entry was added.

dateUpdated.description: The date, in ISO 8601 format, that hour entry was last updated.
